title: What is this typeface?
content:
It is in a new client's logo.  
I appreciate any assistance you can offer. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typefacequestion.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070609/http:/typophile.com/files/typefacequestion.jpg) | 65.92 KB |
author: Bundlebrat

comments.content:
Thanks. I should have got that. Damn, I am not a fan of it. The 's' feels weak, the 'g' too.

I am hoping to redesign the logo, but companies become so attached once they've been using it for a few years, even is it is not good. argh.
